subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Frank / Friends
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hmmm, I don't know, I thought they were always here. Plus I don't think
they have to be present to communicate. I used to get some saying they were
in other cities, like etheric versions of our towns.

 We seem to have an old man that died here and doesn't to know it. I've
gottewn his voice twice on two different boxes, and one of the kids friend
knew the guy.

F-S

On Sat, Aug 14, 2010 at 10:17 AM, Country <plaine@...> wrote:

>
>
> It is interesting that you posted this because I was thinking of asking the
> group if using the box, a digital recorder, EVP Maker, and the like created
> any odd occurences in your home. I have had things happen and it always
> seems to be after I have spent some time trying to communicate with one of
> those methods. Does this kind of communication bring spirits into your home?
> Has anyone else had similar experiences to Rick?
> Thanks,
> Country
>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, Rick Wegrzyn
> <rickwegrzyn@...> wrote:
> >
> > I've been investigating for 33 years...The day I got that "BOX" really
> changed
> > things...I don't take everything I hear as spirit,if  I catch it on EVP
> and it's
> > clear I'll take it under my wing for some sort of response,BUT on the
> other hand
> > We're getting our names called and asnwers to "Do You Know Where You Are
> ?" An d
> > the response made us stop and wonder...reponse was "In the
> basement"......HELLO
> > we're in the Basement......Also I believe it will bring out the EVIL
> > SIDE...which we did..and both my house as well as our partners seems to
> have
> > someone that has followed us,turning on lights in the kitchen and opening
> the
> > kitchen cabinets up,It made me feel sick all day and affected our
> cat...not to
> > mention simular things at our partners home...Be careful what you say and
> ask
> > for...cause you might get more than you want.....Love Ya Frank....Rick
> >
>
>  
>
